005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
025 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-substring">fn:substring</a>
026 * functions.
027 */
028public final class FnSubstring {
029  private static final String NAME = "substring";
030  @NonNull
031  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
032      .name(NAME)
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextIndependent()
036      .focusIndependent()
037      .argument(IArgument.builder()
038          .name("sourceString")
039          .type(IStringItem.class)
040          .zeroOrOne()
041          .build())
042      .argument(IArgument.builder()
043          .name("start")
044          .type(IDecimalItem.class)
045          .one()
046          .build())
047      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
048      .returnOne()
049      .functionHandler(FnSubstring::executeTwoArg)
050      .build();
051
052  @NonNull
053  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
054      .name(NAME)
055      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
056      .deterministic()
057      .contextIndependent()
058      .focusIndependent()
059      .argument(IArgument.builder()
060          .name("sourceString")
061          .type(IStringItem.class)
062          .zeroOrOne()
063          .build())
064      .argument(IArgument.builder()
065          .name("start")
066          .type(IDecimalItem.class)
067          .one()
068          .build())
069      .argument(IArgument.builder()
070          .name("length")
071          .type(IDecimalItem.class)
072          .one()
073          .build())
074      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
075      .returnOne()
076      .functionHandler(FnSubstring::executeThreeArg)
077      .build();
078
079  private FnSubstring() {
080    // disable construction
081  }
082
083  @SuppressWarnings({ "unused", "PMD.OnlyOneReturn" })
084  @NonNull
085  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeTwoArg(
086      @NonNull IFunction function,
087      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
088      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
089      IItem focus) {
090
091    IStringItem sourceString = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
092
093    if (sourceString == null) {
094      return ISequence.of(IStringItem.valueOf(""));
095    }
096
097    IDecimalItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
098
099    int startIndex = start.round().asInteger().intValue();
100
101    return ISequence.of(IStringItem.valueOf(
102        fnSubstring(
103            sourceString.asString(),
104            startIndex,
105            sourceString.toString().length() - Math.max(startIndex, 1) + 1)));
106  }
107
108  @SuppressWarnings({ "unused", "PMD.OnlyOneReturn" })
109  @NonNull
110  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeThreeArg(
111      @NonNull IFunction function,
112      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
113      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
114      IItem focus) {
115
116    IStringItem sourceString = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
117
118    if (sourceString == null) {
119      return ISequence.of(IStringItem.valueOf(""));
120    }
121
122    IDecimalItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
123    IDecimalItem length = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
124
125    return ISequence.of(IStringItem.valueOf(
126        fnSubstring(
127            sourceString.asString(),
128            start.round().asInteger().intValue(),
129            length.round().asInteger().intValue())));
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
134   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-substring">fn:substring</a>.
135   *
136   * @param source
137   *          the source string to get a substring from
138   * @param start
139   *          the 1-based start location
140   * @param length
141   *          the substring length
142   * @return the substring
143   */
144  @NonNull
145  public static String fnSubstring(
146      @NonNull String source,
147      int start,
148      int length) {
149    int sourceLength = source.length();
150
151    // XPath uses 1-based indexing, so subtract 1 for 0-based Java indexing
152    int startIndex = Math.max(start, 1);
153
154    // Handle negative or zero length
155    int endIndex = length <= 0 ? startIndex : Math.min(start + length, sourceLength + 1);
156
157    // Ensure startIndex is not greater than endIndex
158    startIndex = Math.min(startIndex, endIndex);
159
160    return ObjectUtils.notNull(source.substring(startIndex - 1, endIndex - 1));
161  }
162}
